summary: An enthusiastic fullstack web developer with big passion for coding, solving problems and best coding practices and architecture. Always finding time to take some photos, do sports or dance. Very passionate about design and digital art. Highly motivated and extremely eager to learn.

During this perion of my life I had a pleasure to coordinate a group of 5 people for few months and be a technical leader as well as a team manager during coding course organised by Coding Crew.

projects.name: Master’s thesis project - 'Comparison of a microservices architecture and monolithic architecture on the example of web application'
projects.description: In this project I have built machine learning heavy web application which were detecting image content as well as basic CRUD app that had high number of databases connections. I created two versions of the same applications - one monolith and the other in currently favored microservice-based way. The later was tested on multiple machines, each having separate conserns and separate microservice. It all was connected and implemented with Sprint Cloud Suite. Series of tests improved my thesis that its sometimes not worth to use microservice approach. For further info please contact me. I would exaplain my experiments with pleasure.

projects.name: Bachelor thesis project - 'Web application supporting IT project management'
projects.description: This application, heavily inspired by Atlasian's JIRA, was web biased IT Project management tool built on Spring Stack and AngularJS UIs.
